results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d<n} A019565(d)^[1 == d mod 3].
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
formula: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d<n} A019565(d)^[1 == d mod 3].
program: A019565(n) = {my(j,v); factorback(Mat(vector(if(n, #n=vecextract(binary(n), "-1..1")), j, [prime(j), n[j]])~))}; \\ This function from _M. F. Hasler_
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 03 2018
